items.name: Chicken Inasal
items.description: Roast chicken marinated in a mixture of lime, pepper, vinegar and annato, then grilled over hot coals while basted with the marinade.

items.name: Sisig
items.description: A dish made from parts of pig head and liver, usually seasoned with calamansi and chili peppers.

items.name: Pork Belly Sinigang
items.description: A stew characterized by its sour and savoury taste most often associated with tamarind.

items.name: Beef Kaldereta
items.description: The meat is stewed with potatoes, carrots, tomato sauce and liver paste.

items.name: Kare-kare
items.description: A traditional oxtail stew complimented with a thick savory peanut sauce.

items.name: Adobo
items.description: Chicken marinated in vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, and black peppercorns, which is browned in oil, and simmered in the marinade.

items.name: Dinuguan
items.description: A savory stew of pork offal and/or meat simmered in a rich, spicy dark gravy of pig blood, garlic, chili, and vinegar.

items.name: Isaw
items.description: Isaw is a street food from the Philippines, made from barbecued pig or chicken intestines.

items.name: Lumpiang Shanghai
items.description: A dish made-up of ground pork or beef, minced onion, carrots, and spices with the mixture held together by beaten egg.

items.name: Pork Barbecue
items.description: Composed of thinly sliced pork pieces that are marinated in a special mixture of seasonings and spices.
